name: Uiiverse
author: meltstrap
description:
Uiiverse is a re-creation of Nintendo's well-known social network, Miiverse. It allows you to interact with fellow Nintendo fans, give Yeahs to posts, and share screenshots of your favorite games. Now available on Nintendo Switch.

Uiiverse for Nintendo Switch. This is based on LennyTube. Check it out on https://github.com/noirscape/lennytube.

Thanks to:

Noirscape for creating LennyTube
joo and Ashley for testing this
The Uiiverse team for all their support
You for checking this out.
